articles.description: The ChatGPT mobile app's net revenue first jumped 22% on the day of the GPT-4o launch and continued to grow in the following days.
articles.content: Consumer demand for the latest AI technology is heating up. The launch of OpenAI’s latest flagship model, GPT-4o, has now driven the company’s biggest-ever spike in revenue on mobile, despite the mod… [+2327 chars]

articles.title: 'Pune teen driver a human bomb': Uncle of techie killed in Porsche crash - India Today
articles.description: The uncle of a techie who was killed in an accident after a sports car driven by a 17-year-old boy rammed his two-wheeler called the minor a quothuman bombquot and said the bail conditions imposed on him were ridiculous
